com.azure.data.cosmos.internal.changefeed

Interface ChangeFeedContextClient


  • public interface ChangeFeedContextClient
    The interface that captures the APIs required to handle change feed processing logic.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the document client instance and cleans up the resources.

    • Method Detail

      • readPartitionKeyRangeFeed

        reactor.core.publisher.Flux<FeedResponse<PartitionKeyRange>> readPartitionKeyRangeFeed(String partitionKeyRangesOrCollectionLink,
                                                                                       FeedOptions feedOptions)
        Reads the feed (sequence) of PartitionKeyRange for a database account from the Azure Cosmos DB service as an asynchronous operation.
        Parameters:
        partitionKeyRangesOrCollectionLink - the link of the resources to be read, or owner collection link, SelfLink or AltLink. E.g. /dbs/db_rid/colls/coll_rid/pkranges.
        feedOptions - the options for the request; it can be set as null.
        Returns:
        an an Flux containing one or several feed response pages of the obtained items or an error.

      • createDocumentChangeFeedQuery

        reactor.core.publisher.Flux<FeedResponse<CosmosItemProperties>> createDocumentChangeFeedQuery(CosmosContainer collectionLink,
                                                                                              ChangeFeedOptions feedOptions)
        Method to create a change feed query for documents.
        Parameters:
        collectionLink - Specifies the collection to read documents from.
        feedOptions - The options for processing the query results feed.
        Returns:
        an Flux containing one or several feed response pages of the obtained items or an error.

      • readDatabase

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<CosmosDatabaseResponse> readDatabase(CosmosDatabase database,
                                                                 CosmosDatabaseRequestOptions options)
        Reads a database.
        Parameters:
        database - a reference to the database.
        options - the CosmosContainerRequestOptions for this request; it can be set as null.
        Returns:
        an Mono containing the single cosmos database response with the read database or an error.

      • readContainer

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<CosmosContainerResponse> readContainer(CosmosContainer containerLink,
                                                                   CosmosContainerRequestOptions options)
        Reads a CosmosContainer.
        Parameters:
        containerLink - a reference to the container.
        options - the CosmosContainerRequestOptions for this request; it can be set as null.
        Returns:
        an Mono containing the single cosmos container response with the read container or an error.

      • createItem

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<CosmosItemResponse> createItem(CosmosContainer containerLink,
                                                           Object document,
                                                           CosmosItemRequestOptions options,
                                                           boolean disableAutomaticIdGeneration)
        Creates a CosmosItem.
        Parameters:
        containerLink - the reference to the parent container.
        document - the document represented as a POJO or Document object.
        options - the request options.
        disableAutomaticIdGeneration - the flag for disabling automatic id generation.
        Returns:
        an Mono containing the single resource response with the created cosmos item or an error.

      • deleteItem

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<CosmosItemResponse> deleteItem(CosmosItem itemLink,
                                                           CosmosItemRequestOptions options)
        DELETE a CosmosItem.
        Parameters:
        itemLink - the item reference.
        options - the request options.
        Returns:
        an Mono containing the cosmos item resource response with the deleted item or an error.

      • replaceItem

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<CosmosItemResponse> replaceItem(CosmosItem itemLink,
                                                            Object document,
                                                            CosmosItemRequestOptions options)
        Replaces a CosmosItem.
        Parameters:
        itemLink - the item reference.
        document - the document represented as a POJO or Document object.
        options - the request options.
        Returns:
        an Mono containing the cosmos item resource response with the replaced item or an error.

      • readItem

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<CosmosItemResponse> readItem(CosmosItem itemLink,
                                                         CosmosItemRequestOptions options)
        Reads a CosmosItem
        Parameters:
        itemLink - the item reference.
        options - the request options.
        Returns:
        an Mono containing the cosmos item resource response with the read item or an error.

      • queryItems

        reactor.core.publisher.Flux<FeedResponse<CosmosItemProperties>> queryItems(CosmosContainer containerLink,
                                                                           SqlQuerySpec querySpec,
                                                                           FeedOptions options)
        Query for items in a document container.
        Parameters:
        containerLink - the reference to the parent container.
        querySpec - the SQL query specification.
        options - the feed options.
        Returns:
        an Flux containing one or several feed response pages of the obtained items or an error.

      • getServiceEndpoint

        URI getServiceEndpoint()
        Returns:
        the Cosmos client's service endpoint.

      • readContainerSettings

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<CosmosContainerProperties> readContainerSettings(CosmosContainer containerLink,
                                                                             CosmosContainerRequestOptions options)
        Reads and returns the container properties.
        Parameters:
        containerLink - a reference to the container.
        options - the CosmosContainerRequestOptions for this request; it can be set as null.
        Returns:
        an Mono containing the read container properties.

      • getContainerClient

        CosmosContainer getContainerClient()
        Returns:
        the Cosmos container client.
